spell1.name: Quantum Magic
spell1.description: Launch quantum energy bolts at enemies using your primary fire.

spell2.name: Cosmic Cluster
spell2.description: Gather quantum energy into a cluster and then swiftly launch it at the enemy.

attributes.label: CASTING
attributes.value: Charged release with multiple delayed projectiles

attributes.label: FIRE RATE
attributes.value: 0.3s for first shot, 0.07s for additional shots

spell3.name: Avatar Life Stream
spell3.description: Send a healing stream that can bounce between allies and also heal yourself.

attributes.label: SELF HEAL
attributes.value: Yes, if no target is hit

spell4.name: Soul Bond
spell4.description: Link with allies to share damage and provide healing over time.

attributes.label: DURATION
attributes.value: 6 seconds or until max damage is met

attributes.label: SPECIAL EFFECT
attributes.value: Prevents death at 1 HP if linked

spell5.name: Karmic Revival
spell5.description: Deploy a quantum zone that revives fallen allies within its area.

attributes.label: REVIVAL LIMIT
attributes.value: One revive per ally per activation

spell6.name: Regenerative Cocoon
spell6.description: After death, become a soul and reforge your body at a location of your choosing.

spell7.name: Soul Perseverance
spell7.description: Empower Star-Lord and Mantis with cocoon revival when teaming up.

updates.change: Increased Quantum Magic's damage from 55 to 60.
Reduced Cosmic Cluster's projectile speed from 120m/s to 100m/s.
Added brief invincibility to revived players using Karmic Revival.
